meanings.definition: Small explosive device used for entertainment.
meanings.sent1: During the festival, we lit firecrackers in the evening.
meanings.sent2: The children were excited to hear the sound of firecrackers on New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent3: The firecrackers popped loudly, making everyone jump in surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of firecrackers, spreading joy around.
meanings.sent5: The colorful firecrackers lit up the night sky, creating a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A loud noise made by exploding firecrackers.
meanings.sent1: The sudden bang of the firecrackers startled the birds in the trees.
meanings.sent2: The firecrackers echoed through the neighborhood, announcing the start of the celebration.
meanings.sent3: The firecrackers' noise was so loud that even the dogs started barking.
meanings.sent4: The sound of firecrackers filled the air, drowning out all other noises.
meanings.sent5: The firecrackers' explosion was like a thunderclap, reverberating in the night.

meanings.definition: To set off firecrackers for celebration.
meanings.sent1: We will firecrackers at midnight to welcome the new year.
meanings.sent2: The tradition is to firecrackers at weddings for good luck.
meanings.sent3: He loves to firecrackers during festivals to bring joy to others.
meanings.sent4: The crowd cheered as he firecrackers into the sky, lighting up the darkness.
meanings.sent5: She carefully firecrackers one by one, enjoying the festive atmosphere.
